servinfo.title: Power Door Mirror Actuator Inspection (If Equipped)

s1.ptxt: Remove door trim referring to step 1) to 3) of Front Door Glass Removal and Installation .
Check that door mirror operates properly when battery voltage is applied to connector terminals.
Connect battery positive (+) and negative (–) terminal to the door mirror terminals as shown.
If it does not follow the table’s operation, replace door mirror assembly.
